What we are talking about?

  • transition property
  • animation property
  • @keyframes property

Transition

div {
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
  background: red;
  padding: 10px;
}
div:hover {
  background: green;
  padding: 20px;
}

Transition

Transition

Transition parameters

.example {
  transition: 
    [transition-property:name[,...]|all|none] 
    [transition-duration:1s|0.5s|100ms] 
    [transition-timing-function:
      ease|linear|cubic-bezier|
      ease-in|ease-out|ease-in-out]
    [transition-delay:-1s|1s|0.5s|100ms];
}

Animation

animation

div {
  -webkit-animation: movie 5s infinite;
}
@-webkit-keyframes movie {
    0%   {top: 0; left:0}
    25%  {top: 0px; left:600px;}
    50%  {top: 200px; left:600px;}
    75%  {top: 200px; left:0px;}
    100% {top: 0; left:0}
}

animation

Animation parameters

.example {animation:
    [animation-name: mymove]
    [animation-duration: 4s|100ms]
    [animation-timing-function: ease-out;
      ease|linear|cubic-bezier|
      ease-in|ease-out|ease-in-out]
    [animation-delay: -2s|2s|100ms]
    [animation-iteration-count: 10|infinity]
    [animation-direction:
      normal|reverse|alternate|alternate-reverse]
    [animation-fill-mode: none|forwards|backwards|both]
    [animation-play-state: paused|running]
}

@keyframes parameters

@-webkit-keyframes mymove {
    0%   {top: 0px;}
    25%  {top: 200px;}
    50%  {top: 100px;}
    75%  {top: 200px;}
    100% {top: 0px;}
}
@-webkit-keyframes mymove {
    from {top: 0px;}
    to {top: 200px;}
}
